programme.title: Plan B Ep6
programme.desc: Episod ke-6 ini mengisahkan Khai dan Mika cuba berlatih menembak beberapa sasaran ke arah botol dari pistol yang dicuri oleh Mika milik ayahnya dan dia merancang untuk merompak syarikat ayahnya. Sementara itu Dr. Rizman cuba berbincang dengan isteri mengenai anak tunggalnya, Khai, setelah dia mendapati Khai sudah tersasar jauh daripada keluarga. Dr.Rizman juga mengakui dia telah mengabaikan tanggung jawabnya terhadap Khai. Namun Khai menolak segala bentuk bantuan daripada kedua-dua ibu bapanya, walaupun ibunya mengakui kesilapan mereka yang lalu. Kemudian Khai tidak dapat menerima hakikat, kenapa ibu bapanya bersikap demikian terhadapnya dan merasakan seolah-olah dia bukan anak kepada ayahnya, Dr.Rizman.

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudin
programme.desc: Semuanya runtuh apabila Tok Mudim yang popular meninggal dunia dan mula menghantui budak lelaki dan lelaki yang tidak berkhatan di Kampung Seri Menawan.

programme.title: Plan B Ep13
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Iris disoalsiat polis. Dia mendakwa dirinya tidak langsung mengetahui tujuan Khai sebenarnya sehingga dia terlibat dalam rompakan. Namun Khai, Mika, Que dan Iris disabit kesalahan kerana merompak secara berkumpulan dengan bersenjata api dan dihukum penjara sepanjang hayat. Setelah beberapa kali percubaan dalam rayuan kes tersebut, Iris hanya dipenjara beberapa tahun sahaja. Bagaimanapun Khai akan berusaha memboloskan diri dari penjara dan dia berjanji untuk membunuh Iris.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep11
programme.desc: Memaparkan muzium misteri encik Bad terus mendapat sambutan orang ramai sejak Shah, Adam dan Daniel berjaya memerangkap lembaga kuali. Encik Bad mendapat maklum balas bahawa kini ada lembaga perahu jika di tangkap akan menjadi lebih tertarik. Lembaga ini kononnya suka mengganggu oang lelaki yang suka ke seberang di sempadan. Berikutan itu necik Bad mengarahkan mereka meneruskan misi menangkap lembaga perahu. Selepas taklimat dan makan, wang perbelanjaan disampaikan. Mereka berlepas ke sempadan dan kebetulan Adam, Shah dan daniel bertemu dengan encil Lut (Abe Lut). Dia anak tempatan dan membimbing mereka dengan keadaan tempatan di situ. Setelah sewa hotel di sana, pada satu malam mereka bertiga cuba menaiki perahu dan menyusur di sungai. Mereka tidak ketemui apa-apa melainkan seorang anak dara tua. Sungai kelihatan sunyi. Apabila mereka balik ke hotel dimaklumkan oleh Abe Lut sunyi kerana hujung bulan cuma dalam 2 atau 3 hari lagi orang ramai akan menggunakan khidmat untuk ke sempadan. Sebelum berlepas, Shah sempat bertemu Nur dan mereka bersiar-siar dan makan bersama. Manakala Nur terus berusaha untuk menyatukan bapa dan ibunya yang bercerai. Kali ini mereka makan bersekali. Semasa berehat di hotel, Daniel terlajak tidur dan mengigau semasa dia dijeti sebaik-baik hendak naik perahu, kakinya ditarik, kesempatan itu Shah mengusiknya sambil menarik kakinya sehingalah dia tersedar dari tidur. Misi akan diteruskan.

programme.title: Algojo: Perang Santet
programme.desc: Desta ialah seorang dewasa yang misteri dan menyendiri yang mencari orang yang bertanggungjawab atas kematian ibu bapanya kerana ingin membalas dendam. Dia mesti memutuskan sama ada untuk memenuhi keinginannya atau memilih tindakan yang lebih beradab.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila

Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie Ii
programme.desc: Inspektor Mazlan dan Inspektor Aleeza ditugaskan untuk menyiasat tentang satu sindiket penyeludapan dadah terbesar di Malaysia yang diketuai oleh seorang penjenayah yang bernama Raziman. Sindiket ini mempunyai berpuluh-puluh pengedar di seluruh negara dan dikaitkan dengan satu sindiket dadah antarabangsa.

programme.title: Dia Pasti Datang
programme.desc: Larasati merancang untuk berkahwin. Dia berkawan dengan Alya walaupun hanya melalui alam maya. Mereka melakukan tarian kolaboratif yang juga merupakan persembahan terakhir Larasati sebelum dibunuh. Roh Larasati memasuki tubuh Alya dan membalas dendam kematiannya.

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Gerabak Cinta
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luna, usahawan berjaya yang ditipu tunangnya, Razi. Dia kecewa apabila perniagaan yang mereka usahakan rugi kerana Razi terbabit dengan skandal wang serta mempunyai perempuan simpanan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Onrust
programme.desc: Dalam perjalanan ke Pulau Onrust, Bramanto Putra menjumpai sebuah diari purba semasa mencari objek bersejarah. Ia milik kekasih Maria Van De Velde, yang hilang secara misteri. Bram dan seorang lagi pelajar arkeologi bernama Susan memutuskan untuk melakukan penyelidikan tentang pemilik buku harian itu, yang membawa kepada akibat yang membawa maut kerana mereka secara tidak sengaja membuat sihir gelap ke atas pulau itu.

programme.title: Maama Machan
programme.desc: ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Kisah dua orang sahabat yang menyara hidup dengan mencuri motosikal secara kecil-kecilan untuk satu sindiket.

programme.title: Epok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Epok yang cuba membaiki hubungan tegang antara dia dan bapanya, Pak Din, melalui sukan badminton

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: It Takes A Man And Women
programme.desc: Jalan cerita tentang seorang gadis miskin yang bekerja dengan seorang lelaki kaya di sebuah syarikat penerbitan majalah. Dia bercinta dengan lelaki tersebut namun lelaki itu telah berlaku curang kerana mementingkan diri. Gadis tersebut pergi membawa diri ke Amerika Syarikat untuk bekerja dan setelah beberapa tahun dia menjadi seorang perunding penerbitan yang berjaya dan professional. Suatu hari, syarikat lelaki tersebut mengalami masalah dan memerlukan seorang perunding penerbitan. Lembaga pengarah telah menghantar gadis itu untuk menjadi perunding bagi menyelamatkan syarikat tersebut.

programme.title: Datin Glam
programme.desc: Kisah Nona yang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk menjaga sepupunya, Datin Ros yang sedang sakit tenat. Datin Ros berhajat untuk suaminya Datuk Kamal mengahwini Nona sekiranya dia tidak ada lagi.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13 Ep9
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: keharmonian sebuah rumah tangga diragut setelah ketua keluarga dinaikkan pangkat dan hanyut dengan nikmat dunia

programme.title: Kl Wangan
programme.desc: Hong dan Yudi yang berkongsi sejarah mengenai lumba kereta jalanan, dari kereta biasa sehinggalah kereta berkuasa tinggi. Selepas bertahun membawa haluan masing-masing, kedua-dua sibuk mengembangkan perniagaan mereka. Satu hari, mereka secara tidak sengaja bertemu semula di satu perlumbaan tanpa menyedari mereka bersaing sesama sendiri.

programme.title: Onrust
programme.desc: Dalam perjalanan ke Pulau Onrust, Bramanto Putra menjumpai sebuah diari purba semasa mencari objek bersejarah. Ia milik kekasih Maria Van De Velde, yang hilang secara misteri. programme.title: Suluhkan Aku Cahaya
programme.desc: Syarif maklumkan sebenarnya dia jahil agama dan sebelum ini hanya lakonan sahaja. Zulaikha pada mulanya kecewa dengan sikap suaminya namun dia demi cinta dia ingin membantu Syarif. Perbualan mereka didengari oleh Ustaz Jamal lalu Ustaz Jamal lantas dia meminta mereka untuk tinggal dengannya.

programme.title: Haji Gugel
programme.desc: Arman yang tak pernah langsung ke Mekah, apatah lagi mengerjakan haji, sentiasa menjual temberang dengan lagaknya kepada orang-orang kampung tentang haji, dengan berdasarkan internet "Google" sahaja.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: Dollah Superstar

programme.title: Momzillas
programme.desc: Clara dan Minerva, dua wanita yang berkongsi lelaki yang sama, bertemu semula apabila anak lelaki dan anak perempuan masing-masing berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta Kita

programme.title: Rompak Raya
programme.desc: Amy dan Awie memerlukan duit demi menyambut hari raya lalu mereka nekad untuk merompak sehari sebelum raya. Tanpa disangka mereka dikepung oleh polis dan terperangkap dalam kedai tersebut bersama Mak Teh, Suraya dan Geeta.

programme.title: Haji Gugel
programme.desc: Arman yang tak pernah langsung ke Mekah, apatah lagi mengerjakan haji, sentiasa menjual temberang dengan lagaknya kepada orang-orang kampung tentang haji, dengan berdasarkan internet "Google" sahaja.

programme.title: Tmo Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Mat Kari Mek Tomyam

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Abang
programme.desc: Anak lelaki sulung dan waris kepada keluarga kaya Kuala Lumpur pulang ke tanah air selepas pemergian mengejut ke London sedekad lalu. Keluarganya bergelut dengan emosi mereka tentang kepulangannya sementara dia cuba menjadikan kehidupan seperti biasa kerana dia mungkin tahu bagaimana dan mengekalkan rahsianya.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Biarpun Mantan Kita ke Pelaminan
programme.desc: Runi dan Ruben terpaksa berpisah karena ayah mereka menjadi musuh bebuyutan. Ketika Runi dekat dengan seorang lelaki lain, Ruben merasa tersinggung dan sedih karena ia masih mencintai Runi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep144
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep56
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep7
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep87
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep129
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Jodoh Terhalang Tiang Jemuran
programme.desc: Apabila takdir sudah ditentukan, walau apa pun halangannya, jodoh tidak akan ke mana.

programme.title: Suster El Ep1
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep13
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Oppa KW Terlalu Meresahkan
programme.desc: Berjodoh dengan Oppa KW memang membuat Hesti berasa gelisah, begitulah yang berlaku pada Hesti pemandu van yang mengira Binsar adalah Oppa Korea sebenar.

programme.title: Kamera Cinta Ep7
programme.desc: Kamera Cinta adalah adaptasi format antarabangsa dari "Hear Me Love Me See Me", di mana seorang wanita bujang akan bertemujanji dengan 6 orang lelaki tanpa dapat melihat satu sama lain. Ketika bertemujanji, lelaki akan menggunakan kamera aksi di badan mereka dan wanita bujang dapat berkenalan dengan rakan, keluarga atau rakan sekerja mereka. Hanya seorang lelaki yang akan dipilih dan akan melangkah ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Jodoh Terhalang Tiang Jemuran
programme.desc: Apabila takdir sudah ditentukan, walau apa pun halangannya, jodoh tidak akan ke mana.

programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Ada Apa Dengan Cewek Ayam Crispy
programme.desc: Ima, penjual Ayam Crispy, lebih laris daripada restoran Ayam Crispy milik Alfi. Alfi selalu mencari cara untuk mendekati Ima agar dapat mengetahui resep rahasia Ayam Crispy miliknya dan restorannya bisa ramai pengunjung.

programme.title: Aku Istri Yang Dicintai Tapi Sering Disakiti
programme.desc: Pernikahan Andy dan Dina hancur kerana hasutan ibu Andy dan Rika. Ibunya Andy berambisi untuk menyingkirkan Dina dan berusaha supaya Rika boleh menjadi isteri Andy. Bagaimanakah nasib rumah tangga Andy dan Dina seterusnya?

programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Panji Petualang 911 Ep4
programme.desc: Tonton program Panji Petualang 911 untuk mempelajari tentang haiwan dan memerhati keunikan alam liar sambil berseronok dalam pengembaraan bersama Panji.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep32
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.desc: Under the guidance of He Jiong, William Chan, Wowkie Zhang, Li Dan and Qi Wei, 56 interesting youngsters would experience various tests for three months, to pick out six serious GAGMAN with professional variety skills.

programme.title: Athletes and Stars Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The reality show gathered over 20 top sports champions and artists including Chun Wu, Fan Zhiyi, Meng Hetang and Han Tianyu. They divided into two teams to have 12 different sports competitions. They strive for the champion and hopefully compete for the glory of “Champion Team”.

programme.title: Melody Of Time Season 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Melody of Time is back with Season 3 and brings a fantastic experience in various elements, including themes and contents. Some well-known singers and musicians are invited to perform the classic Chinese songs and share their views in the show. The guests include Dicky Cheung, Kenny Chung, Christopher Wong, and Warren Mok.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: The Detectives' Adventures Season 3 Ep3
programme.desc: The program will create a brand-new "adventure" concept. The “Dectective” family members, ZTAO, Ning Jing, Gulnazar, Sun Honglei , Qian Sun, Nana Xie, Xu Zhi Sheng, will use their reasoning ability and teamwork to escape from the predicament, and obtain plot clues and find the truth of the plot.

programme.title: The Decade Ep3
programme.desc: The documentary records the “Decade Witnesses” who participate on national infrastructure and construction, experienced great changes on profound modification.

programme.title: Strawberryman Ep14
programme.desc: Breaking the traditional mode of music variety show, around 24 groups of rock bands, folk bands, hip-hop, electronic and other styles of musicians are invited to perform in an outdoor concert and become a member of Strawberryman. The guests include Jam Hsiao, GAI, and Zhang Ya Dong.

programme.title: Super Mom Ep2
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep10
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Let’s share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep169
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep451
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep4243
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep3
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep839840
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep674
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3376
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46384639
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep2324
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1821
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46394640
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2049
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3623
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2660
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3623
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46404641
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep2728
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2050
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep926
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Fagara
programme.desc: After her father’s death, a Hong Kong girl discovers she has two hitherto unknown sisters, Branch and Cherry. Through taking up her late father’s hotpot restaurant, she reunites with her sisters by different mothers, and understands her father more from a different perspective, allowing her to finally resolve her long-time hard feelings with him.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: The pregnant queen of the monster realm flees a civil war and lands in human world, near Yung Ning Village. She seeks the help of a wimpy villager to become the surrogate father for her child, Wuba. From the time he was born, little Wuba embarks on a thrilling journey to escape from those who want to capture him at all costs.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: Fei hates his father and to inherit his fortune, hires a killer to kill him. When he finds out his sister is the heiress to the fortune, Fei wants to kill her too...

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin’s trust, Nick becomes his protégé and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves “The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real “Chosen Sleuth” instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: Famed doctor Mo Tian Shi (Richard Ng) concocts an immortality medicine to save his terminally ill daughter Xiao Xin, but the cost for immortality is that she must drink human blood. Twenty years later, Mo's apprentice Li Yao Shi (Chin Siu Ho) returns to town and notices something is amiss, only to realise the horror is just about to begin…

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: The Bride From Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master’s granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue…

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus’ Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu’s disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays Kwei Wu, who stumbles onto a kidnapping with his wife Kan Lien-chu (Chin Ping) at the Red Lotus Temple. Kan sends Kwei to go for reinforcements while she stays to fight the kidnappers, but she is captured and imprisoned in an iron cage. As Kwei returns with reinforcements, he must also race to the temple to save his wife.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Return Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studio’s highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang’s leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her family’s objection, so Hong’s maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Hagola Ep31
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Oomai Sennaai
programme.desc: A man who wants to leave his shady life behind gets embroiled in a web of conspiracy where the perpetrators are sinister politicians, corrupt police officers and seedy gangsters.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep17
programme.desc: On the eve of her engagement to Rishi, Lakshmi has butterflies in her stomach, thinking about him. Later, Rishi and Lakshmi's engagement ceremony gets underway with great fervour.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep18
programme.desc: Soon after Lakshmi reaches the wedding venue, a disguised Balwinder follows her with the intention to marry her against her will.

programme.title: Thalli Pogathey
programme.desc: When Karthik refuses to elope with his lover, Pallavi, she decides to marry Arun and emigrates to France. However, madly in love, Karthik follows her to France a year later to win her heart back.

programme.title: Rowdy Inspector
programme.desc: A fearless policeman gets killed by a ruthless politician. Soon, a lookalike thief takes his place and vows to avenge his killing.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep34
programme.desc: After arriving in their honeymoon suite, Laxmi is left puzzled by Rishi's distant behaviour towards her. Later, Laxmi's friend, Shalu, calls and pulls up Laxmi for shielding Neha and her misdeeds.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep35
programme.desc: While Laxmi is baffled by Rishi's impassive attitude towards her, the astrologer's words make Neelam's blood run cold and she frantically tries to contact Rishi.

programme.title: Lakshana Ep11
programme.desc: In spite of Nakshatra's best efforts, Milli threatens to kick her out of the job. However, Nakshatra asks for another opportunity to prove herself.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep46
programme.desc: Having decimated Pavitra, Rani decides to consummate her marriage with Sanchit. However, aided by Matarani's blessings, Rocky succeeds in stopping Rani from executing her evil designs.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep47
programme.desc: Pavitra is shocked to observe Rani perform the rituals, which confirms Rani having consummated her marriage with Sanchit.Later, the 'Maha Pishach' crown enters the house as everyone falls unconscious.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep48
programme.desc: With Rani decimated, Rocky gradually returns to his former self, much to Pavitra's delight. However, Rani is filled with blind rage against Pavitra for foiling her plans and swears to destroy her.

programme.desc: Raja moves to a coastal hamlet and soon opposes the tyrannical ways of Kaka Mani, a local money-monger who harasses those who fail to pay their debt on time.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep36
programme.desc: As Rishi finds his life in danger following an attack by a crocodile, Rani puts her life on the line in order to try and save him.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep37
programme.desc: A villager informs Rishi that Lakshmi risked her life in order to save him from death. Later, Neelam informs her husband about Rishi's ill fate.

programme.title: Lakshana Ep12
programme.desc: Shwetha puts forth her conditions in front of Nakshatra in order to save her job. Later, Shwetha wishes to be the face of the radio show.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep49
programme.desc: Pavitra is shocked to observe Rocky's body gradually engulfing in flames while Rani watches in delight. Meanwhile, as Rani's spell on Sanchit begins to wane, she tries to cast another spell on him.

programme.desc: As the family members prepare for the 'Karwa Chauth' festival, Rani influences Sanchit to do her bidding. Meanwhile, Pavitra tries to comfort Rocky while Rani mocks her for her futile attempts.

programme.desc: As Rocky begins losing his mind and slowly slipping into the 'Pisach Lok', Vidya plots a strategy to save him. Meanwhile, Nikita arrives at the Rajput mansion and is shocked to see her parents alive.

programme.desc: Heinrich, a cranky 93-year-old, hires Afghan refugee, Adib, to dig his dog’s grave. Adib falls unconscious from a wound but refuses to go to a hospital for fear of deportation. And the two strangers, Heinrich and Adib, spend a dramatic night together.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Deadly Desire
programme.desc: When an Istanbul real estate manager is burned alive in his car, Inspector Mehmet Özakin has to dig into a maze of corruption and fraud to try and piece together the deadly puzzle - and almost becomes a victim himself.

programme.title: Adela
programme.desc: In this neo-realistic drama, an 80-year-old grandma spends her birthday alone in the slums while waiting for her children to show up. As she reflects on the bygone years of stability, her will to live dignified despite the disappointment of life emerges.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: The Last Straw
programme.desc: Mother Earth has always been collecting plastic ever since mankind stopped caring about the amount of plastic that was endangering their home planet. This leads Mother Earth to punish mankind and all that comes with it.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the “Karnaval” brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Don't Forget To Breathe
programme.desc: Klemen adores his older brother, Peter. When Peter becomes distracted with his affair with the beautiful Sonja, Klemen is angry that he’s been cast aside. At the same time, he struggles to ignore his growing obsession with Sonja’s feminine sensuality.

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the school’s notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: Forever
programme.desc: Childhood friends, Nina and Hugo chose different paths in life. Years later, Hugo returns to his hometown unbeknownst to him, the day before Nina's wedding. Events on the wedding day throw them back together and they embark on a new adventure.

programme.title: My Words, My Lie, My Love
programme.desc: A hapless waiter finds an unpublished manuscript and decides to claim it as his own to win his lady love. Fame and romance soon follow when the book gets published. But then, the real author appears on the scene.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. There's a backwards biker, a superhero stopped for speeding and an extreme case of Russian road rage. Along for the ride is our celebrity castincluding Judy Gold, Danny Bonaduce, Kevin McCaffrey and Billy Kimball.

programme.desc: Howard and Raj try to get to the bottom of why Sheldon disappears every afternoon at 2:45. Meanwhile, Leonard and Penny wrestle with jealousy in their relationship.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Deep Thinkers - Our Spies search the ocean for intelligent life. In this episode, Spy Sperm Whale has close encounters with the largest brains on the planet, while Spy Octopus takes us inside the mind of the world's smartest octopus. From ocean-diving macaques to fish artistry, from hermit crab cooperation to clownfish teamwork, a new team of spies will leave you thinking differently about life in the ocean.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads 4 (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - Actor Stephen Mangan and comedian Lara Ricote, who have never met before, aim to reach the northernmost point of Australia.

programme.desc: Gabon - Steve Backshall and his team travel to Gabon, to help the government to try and establish an area of land and home for wildlife as a UNESCO World Heritage site.

programme.title: Robson Green: Extreme Fisherman 1 (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Ecuador - In the last episode of the series, Robson Green fishes for the voracious grouper fish off the coast of Ecuador.

programme.title: Inside the Factory 4 (S4) Ep9
programme.desc: Cheese - Gregg Wallace is in Gateshead at a cheese factory where they produce 3000 tonnes of spreadable cheese every year.

programme.title: Baby Chimp Rescue 1 (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: A New Beginning - At Liberia's only home for rescued chimpanzees, new arrivals keep flooding in. Jimmy and Jenny Desmond and their team are now at breaking point.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4 (S4) Ep2
programme.desc: Ethiopia, Simien Mountains - The Simien Mountains is an exotic and dramatic landscape set in the northern corner of Ethiopia. Breath-taking views abound in this natural landscape inhabited by unique and endangered wildlife.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Pembrokeshire, Wales - Adventurer Ben Fogle returns to the Pembrokeshire coast to catch up with Matthew and Charis Watkinson, and their two children.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing 1 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Miami - Robson Green heads to Miami for the Offshore Grand Slam, but will the weather scupper his plans?

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planet’s biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa’s east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Zanzibar's Poison Monkey - Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungle—and find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years… that can withstand the harshest conditions… and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any other…the enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Handle with Care - Rescued orphan Josh needs his broken wrist examined, and Beni visits the dentist to treat his bad breath. Having overcome her typhoid infection, Alba is reunited with her old friends, but receives a frosty reception.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Isle Royale - Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
